project.description: Check for new stemcell versions, and trigger a CF deployment if a new one is found

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
STEMCELL_BASE_URL=<%= @vars['stemcell_base_url'] %> STEMCELL_SEARCH=<%= @vars['stemcell'] %> STEMCELL_DATA=`curl "${STEMCELL_BASE_URL}/?prefix=${STEMCELL_SEARCH}" 2>/dev/null` STEMCELL_DATE_ADDED=`echo $STEMCELL_DATA | sed 's/.*<LastModified>\([^<]*\)<\/LastModified>.*/\1/' | tr -d ' '` STEMCELL_URL=${STEMCELL_BASE_URL}/${STEMCELL_SEARCH} STEMCELL_TMP_DIR=/tmp/stemcell-dl-${STEMCELL_DATE_ADDED}
rm -rf /tmp/stemcell-dl-* mkdir -p $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR cd $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR wget $STEMCELL_URL -O $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR/stemcell.tgz tar -zxvf $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR/stemcell.tgz -C $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR
gem install bosh_cli --pre
for BOSH_TARGET in "<%= @vars['inner_bosh']['director_ip'] %>" "<%= @vars['outer_bosh']['director_ip'] %>" do if bosh -n target $BOSH_TARGET; then bosh -n login $BOSH_USER $BOSH_PASS bosh -n upload stemcell $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR/stemcell.tgz fi done
RUBY_SCRIPT="data = YAML::load(STDIN.read); puts \"#{data['name']} #{data['version']}\"" STEMCELL_PROPS=`cat stemcell.MF | ruby -ryaml -e "$RUBY_SCRIPT"`
cd $WORKSPACE echo ${STEMCELL_TMP_DIR}/stemcell.tgz > stemcell_tgz.txt echo $STEMCELL_DATE_ADDED > stemcell_date_added.txt echo $STEMCELL_PROPS > stemcell_version.txt
